places_to_visit.name: Edinburgh Castle
places_to_visit.description: Edinburgh Castle is a historic fortress perched on Castle Rock. It offers spectacular views over the city and is home to the Crown Jewels and the Stone of Destiny, significant to Scotland's history.

places_to_visit.name: Holyrood Palace
places_to_visit.description: Holyrood Palace is the official residence of the British monarch in Scotland. The palace features beautiful gardens, historical rooms, and an interesting abbey nearby.

places_to_visit.name: Arthur's Seat
places_to_visit.description: Arthur's Seat is an ancient volcano and the main peak in Edinburgh’s Holyrood Park. It offers panoramic views of the city and is a popular spot for hiking and outdoor activities.

places_to_visit.name: Royal Mile
places_to_visit.description: The Royal Mile is a historic street in Edinburgh's Old Town, stretching from Edinburgh Castle to Holyrood Palace. It is lined with historic sites, shops, restaurants, and traditional Scottish pubs.

places_to_visit.name: National Museum of Scotland
places_to_visit.description: The National Museum of Scotland features a diverse range of exhibits, including Scottish history, natural history, and world cultures. It’s a great place to learn about Scotland’s heritage.
